name: Galaxy Kitchen - GMTK Edition
description:
A species from Zorbi, a planet inhabited only by robots, kidnapped the best cooks of the universe, so they can taste for the first time the flavor of the most perfect cooked food in the entire galaxy.

"Galaxy Kitchen" is a co-op game and your objective as the player is to serve the robots with your partner. Unfortunately, to prevent your escape from the spaceship and to cook and serve better and faster, you and your partner were forced to work together to accomplish the cooking tasks.

-------------------------Commands Player 1--------------------------

Walk: ↑ ← ↓ → or Mouse (Left Button)

Grab ingredients: SPACE or ENTER  or Mouse (Left Button)

Put ingredients in the oven: SPACE or ENTER or  Mouse (Left Button)

Throw food in the trash: SPACE or ENTER or Mouse (Left Button)

Deliver food to costumers: SPACE or ENTER or Mouse (Left Button)

You can also play "Galaxy Kitchen" with your gamepad

-------------------------Commands Player 2--------------------------

Join: X

Walk: W A S D

Grab ingredients:  T

Put ingredients in the oven: T 

Throw food in the trash:  T

Deliver food to costumers: T 

You can also play "Galaxy Kitchen" with your gamepad

-------------------------Game Recipes-------------------------

Coffee - Go to the coffee machine and grab it

Hot Chocolate - Milk + Chocolate

Ice Tea - Water + Chamomile

CAUTION: You cannot grab two ingredients at once. Place the first one on the oven and then grab the second one.
